divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching tv and lights through trees I thought it was an air plane but the airplane didnt move for an hour. Went outside so that trees would not interfere withview,pulled out my phone and took a blurry video but you can see the lights. Woke up my wife so she wouldnt think Iwas crazy. She also saw it clearly. I got in my car and followed thelights and it was getting further away but still visible. Forgot my phone at home. When I got back home Icould still see it. When my wife got up for work it was still in the south eastern sky and could see on her way to work. I will be looking again tonight. This was not an airplane or helicopter.
